text: The Hop Exchange is a Grade II listed building at No. 24 Southwark Street, London SE1. It is in the Bankside area of the London Borough of Southwark. It opened in 1867 and was designed by R.H. Moore. It served as the centre for hop trading for the brewing industry. == Other websites == * Official site of the venue * The hop cellars Category:1867 establishments in England Category:Buildings and structures in the London Borough of Southwark Category:Grade II listed buildings in London
title: Hop Exchange
